fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Check to see if someone’s the Evil player (3 night cooldown)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If this role spawns, everyone will get roles like normal, but one player will be the designated “Evil” player. This player will get a multitaskable ability to deal a powerful astral attack to one player and permanent powerful defense, and will have their goal changed to an NK goal, even if they’re on an REF. They will know they’re the Evil player
-If you check someone and they’re the Evil player, it will be revealed to the entire town
-All players will know this role exists
-If the Evil player is hung or killed, all living players win and all dead players lose
-All effects of this role are removed if you die

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Find and kill/hang the Evil player
